properties.name: Buffalo Trace Distillery
properties.description: Posted by Lucybee1001 Wilkinson Blvd, frankfort, kyMore bourbon Tours. My ancestor.

properties.name: CEREMONY - THE FARM
properties.description: Posted by LucybeeCeremony at 6:00 in the Evening 140 Old Versailles 2 Large Stone Pillars Long Driveway 15 minutes from Plaza Hotel

properties.name: COCKTAILS - Bistro La Belle
properties.description: Posted by Lucybee121 East Main Street, Midway, KYWelcome Cocktails in the Wine Lounge- 8:30ish PM Have dinner first at the Bistro or next door, at the Black Tulip . 25 minutes from hotel.

properties.name: Capital Cellars Wine
properties.description: Posted by Lucybee227 West Broadway, Frankfort,KYTobacco isn\'t the only thing Kentucky farmers know how to grow. Try some local wines and a little nosh. open till 10. few blocks from Hotel

properties.name: Capital Plaza Hotel Frankfort
properties.description: Posted by Lucybee 405 Wilkinson Blvd, Frankfort, KYTell them you are with Walsh/Blackburn Have a bourbon at the "Waterfall bar" Shops and restaurants in Historic District within walking distance of hotel. Hotel is 35 minutes from Lexington airport Hotel is 15 minutes from Farm

properties.name: Capitol Building
properties.description: Posted by Lucybee

properties.name: Keeneland Racetrack
properties.description: Posted by Lucybee4201 Versailles Rd, Lexington, KYAcross the street from the airport. One of the most beautiful tracks in the country. No races in June, but the grounds are always open.

properties.name: Kentucky Coffeetree Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Lucybee 235 broadway, frankfort, kyCOFFEE, soups/sandwiches in a cool old bookstore. Hang with the bookish locals. Veggie Friendly. few blocks from hotel

properties.name: Lexington Airport
properties.description: Posted by Lucybee4000 Terminal Drive, Lexington, kyAbout 30 minutes from the Plaza Hotel

properties.name: Louisville Intl Airport-Sdf
properties.description: Posted by Lucybee600 Terminal Dr, Louisville, KYThis here airport is about an hour from Frankfort and the hotel.

properties.name: Marshall's Backstretch Diner
properties.description: Posted by Lucybee 232 west main st, frankfort, kyReal People. Real Food. Not for vegeterians.

properties.name: Quirk Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Lucybee 131 E. Main Street, Midway, KYCasual sandwich and book place in Midway. Low key option for food before Friday cocktails. Open till 9:00 pm.

properties.name: Rick's White Light Diner
properties.description: Posted by Lucybee 114 Bridge street, frankfort, kyVintage Diner. 8 feet wide, but packed with gourmet food, and a politically agressive Chef. Awesome brunch Saturday from 11-2. And you get to cross the Singing Bridge.

properties.name: St. George and the Dragon Pub
properties.description: Posted by Lucybee103 West Main Street, Frankfort, KYTHE Bar of Frankfort (unless you\'re a risk taker) Walking distance from Plaza hotel. Great back deck overlooking the Kentucky River. Meet the partying locals.

properties.name: The Black Tulip
properties.description: Posted by Lucybee133 East Main Street, Midway, KYGood place for dinner Friday night. Same Street as Bistro La Belle. Rub shoulders with the farm folk. Open 4pm - Midnight. Be CAREFUL driving back from Midway to Frankfort. Tricky country roads and lots of man-killing deer.

properties.name: Woodford Reserve Distillery
properties.description: Posted by Lucybee7855 McCracken Pike, Versailles, KYSaturday Morning Tours - The warehouses smell real good!
